body.name: COSTWAY Retro Countertop Microwave Oven, 0.7Cu.ft, 700-Watt, High Energy Efficiency, 5 Micro Power, Delayed Start Function, with Glass Turntable & Viewing Window, LED Display, Child Lock (Green)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 56 mins.
features: 【5 Micro Power Levels & 360° Heating Turntable】This mini microwave oven is equipped with a range of 5 micro power levels (20P-100P), allowing you to adjust the settings to meet your specific cooking or heating requirements. Furthermore, the 360° heating mechanism and rotation of the glass turntable ensure that your food is cooked uniformly and thoroughly. The diameter of turntable is 9.5".

【6 Retro Mechanical Buttons & LED Display】The multifunctional control panel of this top microwave features 6 retro mechanical buttons, making it easy to operate. Additionally, the LED display clearly indicates the remaining cooking time, ensuring readability. Note: Upon completion of the cooking procedure, three beeps will audibly notify you.

【8 Auto Cooking Settings & Easy Operation】 This convection microwave comes with 8 pre-programmed cooking sets for popular foods like popcorn, pizza, and potatoes, offering a simplified cooking experience. All you need to do is select the desired menu and set the weight to initiate the cooking process. With this feature, it brings the utmost convenience and efficiency to your daily life.

【Child Lock Design & Product Information】Designed with a child lock function, just a simple setup ensures the microwave oven is not used by your child without supervision. The overall dimensions of the microwave oven are 18"×14"×10" (L×W×H), with a capacity of 0.7 Cu. Ft. It operates at an output power of 700W and comes with a UL certified power cord for added safety.

【Compact & Retro Appearance】Ideal for small apartments, rv, studios, dorms, and more, this compact microwave oven fits seamlessly into any space. Its vintage appearance not only draws attention but also adds a touch of nobility and elegance to the room. Moreover, the user-friendly multi-function design ensures that it perfectly meets all your usage requirements.
⭐Note: Please note that color differences may occur between different lights and monitors.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Customizable Auto Cooking Settings The retro microwave oven has default cooking menu for popular foods such as popcorn, pizza, potatoes and more for simple operation. Once selected the menu, set the weight to start cooking. Bring convenience and efficiency to your life. 5 Microwave Power & 360°Evenly Heating This microwave oven is designed with 5 microwave power level (100% to 20%) that allows you to adjust according to your different needs, while cooking or heating food. 360° heating and rotation of glass turntable during operation helps to cook food more evenly. Simple Operation & Auto Reminder Six retro mechanical buttons on the multifunctional control panel are easy to operate for users of any age. Easy-to-read LED display clearly shows remaining cooking time. And when the cooking procedure have finished, three beeps sound will be heard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, small, works fine.
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a smallest microwave that is not expensive and doesn't look 'plastic/cheap' on the counter, available in shiny black w chrome accents to match my stuffs. I've only had this one for a couple of months but i'm pretty happy with it so far.This thing is cute, small footprint on the counter, lighter weight, has a vintage look (there are more vintagy looking ones out there, but they for some reason are not black, or have worse reviews), works fine, fits a plate, heats food.The way you set the time is weird at first, but becomes natural really quickly. Push the Instant Start, it puts on 1 minute and starts going, if you want more or less time, twist the big knob to increase or decrease time (clockwise =increase).. Piece of cake, becomes really intuitive. I really have not touched any other buttons on it bc this works fine for me.This is not constructed to live decades, nor should it for 80-some bucks, but it is cute and it is fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful retro affordable but great quality & fits in any space
reviews.reviewText: I love this microwave, even more than my old red microwave that I thought I couldn’t replace. We just got a new house & spent the last month furnish it & buying appliances (we were starting over with nothing). We wanted to replace the microwave that was given to us & I surprised the kids. They all think it’s the coolest retro microwave they have ever seen or used. I agree!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice small microwave - with poor setting controls
reviews.reviewText: We ordered a microwave and mini fridge from COSTWAY and stacked them in our basement. The microwave arrived about a week after ordering (April 2019). We like the appearance. The size is appropriate for our needs. I've used it a few times and it seems to work fine. My biggest complaint is the settings aren't intuitive. I had to read the instructions. This is a microwave that will rarely be used. Nobody wants to read the directions before heating up a cup of coffee. They just want to set the time and press start. Instead, this microwave has unnecessary options that make the display more crowded. Who is going to think, "I'm heating 3.5oz. of fish, so I better use the Auto Cooking option A.8"? I included a picture from the instructions to emphasize the point. Maybe a larger microwave used in a commercial kitchen might need these options, but not a microwave that's more appropriate for a dorm room. Nonetheless, it's a nice little microwave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend this microwave. It doesn’t take a lot of space and the perfect size. Not only that, the color is beautiful and looks exactly like the photos provided. The instructions were clear and everything is so easy to use. This microwave is really impressive, it was able to heat up my food really fast compared to the previous microwaves I’ve had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor customer service once product quit working
reviews.reviewText: Product only lasted a couple years and then started making a loud noise amd stopped warming. I have contacted the company and they let me know the warranty is only 6 months, an appliance should last more than that! The company started to ignore my responses, very unprofessional! I do not recommend this microwave, it's cute but go find something else from a different seller!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OMG! Practically Perfect
reviews.reviewText: Just received my new aqua microwave and it’s practically perfect! I needed to move my micro out of the kitchen and it became visible from the living room, so I wanted one that would make a statement. It makes a GREAT statement! (See pictures) Set up was quick and easy and, yeah, the cord reaches the plug-in. My Fiesta-ware plate fits,too! I have used it to heat a cup of water and it did well. The only other need I have for it will be warming leftovers. I think it will work for that just as it did with the water .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2021
reviews.reviewText: small ...and works fine does its job..heated some left over worked great no noise and easy to use glad i made this purchase
Don't buy if you have kids no child - lock while it's cooking you can open the door and may burn the child may get burnt by the hot food.
